languages.text: Лорд-капитану удалось не только сохранить самообладание, но и удержать от паники перепуганный отряд. Возглавляемые Вольным Торговцем, разведчики спешно отошли в направлении челнока, преследуемые эхом товарища, все так же рапортующего о продолжаемом движении.

The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану удалось не только сохранить самообладание, но и удержать от паники перепуганный отряд. Возглавляемые Вольным Торговцем, разведчики спешно отошли в направлении челнока, преследуемые эхом товарища, все так же рапортующего о продолжаемом движении.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} no solo logró mantener el autocontrol, sino que evitó que la unidad aterrada sucumbiera al pánico. Liderados por su Comerciante Independiente, los exploradores se retiraron a la lanzadera, perseguidos por la incorpórea voz de su camarada que repetía el mismo mensaje una y otra vez.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} no solo logró mantener el autocontrol, sino que evitó que la unidad aterrada sucumbiera al pánico. Liderados por su Comerciante Independiente, los exploradores se retiraron a la lanzadera, perseguidos por la incorpórea voz de su camarada que repetía el mismo mensaje una y otra vez.

languages.text: 舰长大人不仅克制住了内心的恐惧，还成功地让队员们振作起来，让小队免于陷入完全的恐慌之中。在宋永和支离破碎、不断重复的声音中，侦察兵们追随着行商浪人的脚步，匆匆忙忙地撤回了穿梭机上。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人不仅克制住了内心的恐惧，还成功地让队员们振作起来，让小队免于陷入完全的恐慌之中。在宋永和支离破碎、不断重复的声音中，侦察兵们追随着行商浪人的脚步，匆匆忙忙地撤回了穿梭机上。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは自制心を保ったのみならず、恐怖が渦巻く部隊が完全なパニックに陥るのを防ぐことができた。自由開拓者が率いる偵察部隊は、同じ短いメッセージを繰り返し続ける仲間の肉体のない声に追われて、急いでシャトルに後退した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは自制心を保ったのみならず、恐怖が渦巻く部隊が完全なパニックに陥るのを防ぐことができた。自由開拓者が率いる偵察部隊は、同じ短いメッセージを繰り返し続ける仲間の肉体のない声に追われて、急いでシャトルに後退した。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain wahrte nicht nur die Selbstbeherrschung, sondern verhinderte auch, dass in der verängstigten Einheit ungebremste Panik ausbrach. Unter der Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} eilten die Späher zum Shuttle zurück, verfolgt von der körperlosen Stimme ihres Kameraden, die immer wieder dieselbe kurze Nachricht wiederholte.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain wahrte nicht nur die Selbstbeherrschung, sondern verhinderte auch, dass in der verängstigten Einheit ungebremste Panik ausbrach. Unter der Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} eilten die Späher zum Shuttle zurück, verfolgt von der körperlosen Stimme ihres Kameraden, die immer wieder dieselbe kurze Nachricht wiederholte.

languages.text: {name} parvint non seulement à garder son sang-froid, mais aussi à empêcher l'unité terrifiée de sombrer dans la panique. {mf|Il|Elle} donna ensuite l'ordre de se replier, et les éclaireurs retournèrent précipitamment à la navette, poursuivis par la voix désincarnée de Sohn qui répétait sans cesse son bref message.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: {name} parvint non seulement à garder son sang-froid, mais aussi à empêcher l'unité terrifiée de sombrer dans la panique. {mf|Il|Elle} donna ensuite l'ordre de se replier, et les éclaireurs retournèrent précipitamment à la navette, poursuivis par la voix désincarnée de Sohn qui répétait sans cesse son bref message.

languages.text: Sukûnetini korumakla kalmayan Lord Kaptan, birimin telaşa kapılıp dağılmasına da engel oldu. Hür Tacir önderliğindeki keşif erleri, alelacele mekiğe geri çekildi. Bu sırada yoldaşlarının bedensiz sesleri ise aynı mesajı tekrarlayarak peşlerinden ayrılmadı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain managed not only to maintain {mf|his|her} self-control, but also to keep the terrified unit from veering into outright panic. Led by the Rogue Trader, the scouts hurriedly retreated to the shuttle, pursued by their comrade's disembodied voice, which continued to repeat the same brief message.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, sukûnetini korumakla kalmayıp birimin telaşa kapılıp dağılmasına engel oldu. Hür Tacir önderliğindeki birlik, alelacele mekiğe doğru geri çekildi ancak yoldaşlarının bedensiz sesleri, aynı mesajı tekrarlayarak peşlerinden ayrılmadı.
